message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $175.
Hey Alice, thanks for the offer, but $175 is a bit higher than I'm willing to go. I'd be happy to pay $125 for the product. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $150.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $150 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm sticking with my offer of $125. If you're not willing to go that low, I'll have to go with another seller.
